column1: Rev Duke Younge lived at Puslinch but to get an elevation of 112ft it would have been a very long way from the house. The NGR is for the highest point – at the end of what looks to have been a kitchen garden.
Membland is about 1 ¾ miles due S

1878 Note says “In December a friend took the record and he may have made a mistake for my new gauge at my new residence 100 miles distant caught during the month 3.78in while my friend took 3.40in from my old gauge”
